cmd:
import errno
import glob
import os
import shutil
import sys

src = sys.argv[1]
dst = sys.argv[2]
build_products = ['dm', 'dm.exe', 'dm.app', 'nanobench.app', 'get_images_from_skps', 'get_images_from_skps.exe', 'hello-opencl', 'hello-opencl.exe', 'nanobench', 'nanobench.exe', 'skpbench', 'skpbench.exe', '*.so', '*.dll', '*.dylib', 'skia_launcher', 'skiaserve', 'skottie_tool', 'lib/*.so', 'run_testlab', 'skqp-universal-debug.apk', 'whitelist_devices.json']

try:
  os.makedirs(dst)
except OSError as e:
  if e.errno != errno.EEXIST:
    raise

for pattern in build_products:
  path = os.path.join(src, pattern)
  for f in glob.glob(path):
    dst_path = os.path.join(dst, os.path.relpath(f, src))
    if not os.path.isdir(os.path.dirname(dst_path)):
      os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(dst_path))
    print 'Copying build product %s to %s' % (f, dst_path)
    shutil.move(f, dst_path)
name: copy build products
